title: UNCW is changing the branding and logo. What will be the real cost of changing it?  From business cards to catalogs, to forms and signage.  The cost of all things considered will be mind boggling.  Is there a real estimate of the costs?
text: Hello. Just wanted to let you know they ran the story about the Seahawks new logo today. TheyÍd already been planning to do something, but they incorporated your financial questions into the story. Here's a link to the answer to your question.  http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20150127/ARTICLES/150129751/0/search
